description.value:
This spell functions like @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.1uBprMFBD2pgfllq], except as noted above

Physical Stability

Drawing upon the order and stability of the lawful outer planes, you stabilize a creature’s form with a touch. The target gains a +2 circumstance bonus against transmutation spells and effects. Physical stability counters @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kzOemsOWuqgbbGZw]{Baleful Polymorph} and @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph}, and it counters and negates @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.iexRpt4aK2nePz5J]. If you cast physical stability on a creature already under the effects of a transmutation effect, you can try to dispel one transmutation effect affecting the target. If you do, attempt a dispel check (1d20 + caster level) with a DC equal to 11 + the caster level of the transmutation effect to end the effect.

target.value: up to one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
